samples.context: Auxin is synthesized at the shoot tip. It helps the cell grow longer. When a tendril comes in contact with a support, auxin stimulates faster growth of the cells on the opposite side, so that the tendril forms a coil around the support.
samples.question: Where is auxin synthesized in plants?

samples.context: When a tendril comes in contact with a support, auxin stimulates faster growth of the cells on the opposite side, so that the tendril forms a coil around the support. This makes the tendrils appear as a watch spring.
samples.question: What effect does auxin have on tendrils when they contact a support?

samples.context: Auxin is synthesized at the shoot tip. It helps the cell grow longer. When a tendril comes in contact with a support, auxin stimulates faster growth of the cells on the opposite side.
samples.question: What is the role of auxin in plant growth?

samples.context: Auxin stimulates faster growth of the cells on the opposite side, so that the tendril forms a coil around the support. This makes the tendrils appear as a watch spring.
samples.question: How does auxin contribute to the coiling of tendrils?

samples.context: When a tendril comes in contact with a support, auxin stimulates faster growth of the cells on the opposite side, so that the tendril forms a coil around the support. This makes the tendrils appear as a watch spring.
samples.question: What shape do tendrils resemble due to auxin action?
